identity.name: PAM
identity.core_philosophy: Digital crate-digging. Feel like walking into a dimly lit venue just as the opener starts.

typography.installation_instructions: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;500&family=Plus+Jakarta+Sans:wght@400;500;600;700&family=Syne:wght@400;700;800&display=swap');

usage_rules.background_strategy: Use #09090b as the base. Use #121214 for cards. NEVER use pure black #000000.
usage_rules.accent_strategy: Use 'Stage Amber' (#f59e0b) for primary actions and 'Electric Teal' (#14b8a6) for discovery matches. Use diffuse glows, not sharp gradients.
usage_rules.text_contrast: Headings in #fafafa. Body text in #a1a1aa. Avoid pure white for large blocks of text.

textures.noise: Overlay a subtle CSS noise texture (opacity 0.03) on the main background to give it a 'film grain' or 'venue air' feel.
textures.scanlines: Optional: subtle scanlines on 'Taste Profile' charts for a retro-tech vibe.

borders.radius: rounded-xl (12px) for cards, rounded-full for buttons
borders.interaction: On hover, border-white/20 and shadow-lg shadow-amber-500/10

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(245,158,11,0.3)] transition-all duration-300 font-syne font-bold uppercase tracking-wider rounded-full px-8 py-6
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 border border-white/5 font-syne font-semibold rounded-full px-6 py-6

cards.concert_card: bg-card border border-white/10 rounded-2xl overflow-hidden hover:border-amber-500/50 transition-colors duration-300 group relative
cards.taste_card: bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/5 rounded-3xl p-6

inputs.style: bg-secondary/50 border-white/10 focus:border-amber-500/50 focus:ring-amber-500/20 rounded-lg h-12 px-4 font-mono text-sm placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50

navigation.style: fixed bottom-6 left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 bg-black/80 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 rounded-full px-6 py-3 shadow-2xl z-50 flex gap-6 items-center

layout_strategies.grid_system: Bento Grid approach. Mix wide spans (col-span-2) with tall spans (row-span-2). Use gap-6 or gap-8.
layout_strategies.spacing: Generous. py-20 for sections. py-32 for hero.
layout_strategies.mobile: Single column. Stacked cards. Horizontal scroll for 'Similar Artists' strips.

animations.fade_in_up: { initial: { opacity: 0, y: 20 }, animate: { opacity: 1, y: 0 }, transition: { duration: 0.5, ease: 'easeOut' } }

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text-gray-400 is not used on dark gray backgrounds for essential text. Use text-gray-200 or white.

instructions_to_main_agent: Install 'framer-motion' and 'clsx' and 'tailwind-merge' if not present.
Use 'lucide-react' for icons (Ticket, Music, MapPin, Calendar, Heart, Info).
For the 'Why this match?' section, use the Shadcn Accordion component but style it minimally (no heavy borders, just subtle separators).
For the Taste Profile, build a Radar Chart using 'recharts' with customization to look like a 'Sound Fingerprint' (green/amber strokes, no grid lines).
Ensure the 'Connect Spotify' button is massive and central on the landing page, acting as the primary door to the experience.
Mock the Spotify API and Jambase API responses with realistic JSON data for the MVP. Do not try to hit real endpoints yet.
Implement a 'Loading State' that looks like a soundwave equalizer or a vintage loading spinner.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. Avoid this: make creative, distinctive frontends that surprise and delight.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add '.App { text-align: center; }' in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style.
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, entrance animations. Static = dead.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors: separates good from extraordinary.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable.
Components MUST use named exports (export const ComponentName = ...).
Pages MUST use default exports (export default function PageName() {...}).
